page.title: 06GORGIE FARM,EDINBURGH.
page.content: Gorgie farm is a really good idea. Five years ago it was started at a dump in the middle of a very busy district.It had once been railway ground and they have a big problem because of concrete under the shallow soil.M.S.C.workers and volunteers are managing to grow vegetables,which are then sold.This year they are trying to grow wheat,barley and oats. In the small garden there is also a large variety of herbs. Rust the pig has two piglets,Pancake and Pizza.Black Shetland lambs with their mothers,and a Jacob sheep live in a large sunny pen.Anoushka,one of the three goats has two friendly kids.The largest animal is Pye,the cart-horse,who used to do a milk round in Gorgie until his firm retired all their horses.Local children visit Gorgie farm and help with the work.
